attributes.action: Extend/refund driving instructor badges to allow for lost time due to Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Many people in our driving school industry are facing hardship and we would like to either be refunded back the difference or have the ADI badge extended.
attributes.background: As an industry we have been forced to close down for 8 months, we feel that it is only fair that we should not have to pay for a full 4 years ADI Licence fee.
